entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023
